name: Zahariss

active_effects.name: Fire Mastery
active_effects.description: Mastery of fire techniques increases destructive power and heat control.

active_effects.name: Heat Resistance
active_effects.description: Natural resistance to heat provides protection from fire and heat-based attacks.

appearance_summary: Zahariss is a medium-built fire master with intense, passionate eyes and movements that seem to radiate heat. He carries himself with burning determination and his presence is often accompanied by subtle warmth. His equipment is designed for fire control and heat management.
backstory_summary: Born with natural talent for fire techniques and heat manipulation, Zahariss developed the ability to control flames and create infernos. He dedicated himself to mastering fire arts and became a key member of Konoha's Fire Division. His ability to wield destructive fire has made him a formidable opponent.
personality_summary: Zahariss is a passionate and destructive fire master who approaches combat with burning intensity and determination. He's focused and disciplined, using his fire abilities to overwhelm opponents with heat and destruction. His dedication to his craft makes him both dangerous and reliable.
combat_directives: Use fire techniques to create destructive infernos and control the battlefield. Use heat manipulation to disorient and damage enemies. Use flame techniques to overwhelm opponents with intense heat. Prioritize offensive positioning and fire control. Use inferno techniques to create devastating area attacks.
